TEI.2.document_title: James Gaines and J. E. B. Austin to Jose Antonio Saucedo, 09-05-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Gaines to Saucedo, September 5, 1826. Reporting turbulence at Nacogdoches and accusing Austin of disloyalty to the Government.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This copy does not contain the rubric. There is do cine to the writer. The most likely guess would be Juan Antonio Padilla, secretary to the Governor. See Sprowl to Austin, Nov. 5, 1826.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Gaines to Saucedo, September 5, 1826. Reporting turbulence at Nacogdoches and accusing Austin of disloyalty to the Government.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-05-1826">Sept 5. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*His *person_mentioned*Excellency Don Jose Anto Sausido*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Most excellent sir I have this Year omitted writing as I am unable to write Spanish and had every confidence business would eventually close to the general good of the Government Yet I have seen all the Year the machines of disappointed impure services disappointed *person_mentioned*speculators */person_mentioned*disappointed *person_mentioned*Rouges */person_mentioned*disappointed Office hunters opponents and striving in opposition and each one striving to carry his point but all unanimously opposing the law and authority*/p*
*p*They began on the *date_mentioned n="03-19-1826">19th March*/date_mentioned* by declaring the documents from your *person_mentioned*excellency */person_mentioned*was forged and the *person_mentioned*Authority */person_mentioned*here was arbitrary this part was without effect yet they continued in imprinting of this on the minds of the people untill a certain *person_mentioned*Col. Pettis [Pettus]*/person_mentioned* from *location_mentioned*Austin's Colony*/location_mentioned* arrived here at the *location_mentioned*Irish Bayou */location_mentioned* he declared at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Chandler*/person_mentioned*s Store*/location_mentioned* in the presince of *person_mentioned*Chandler Elbert Hinds Esqr*/person_mentioned* and many *person_mentioned*others */person_mentioned*that there was no law nor *person_mentioned*authority */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*that all they had was from Your *person_mentioned*excellency */person_mentioned*and that you yourself had no authority and that *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*commanded to the *location_mentioned*Sabine */location_mentioned*this immediately took effect with all who could not be received in the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* and all who opposed the Law and authority *person_mentioned*Burrill Thompson*/person_mentioned* immediately commenced to raise a *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*among them declaring they would not suffer in future any man to be turned out of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* and that they would put down the Authority and establish one of their own they all declared by the powers to desist *person_mentioned*Burrill Thompson*/person_mentioned* declared to me there was no law nor *person_mentioned*authority */person_mentioned*there and that He would persist in regulating His *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*and had this meeting and agreed to send *person_mentioned*John A. Williams*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned*to sanction agreable to what *person_mentioned*Pettis */person_mentioned*had told them It appears *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*became anamoured with this plan and sent a large document to *person_mentioned*Benjamin Edwards*/person_mentioned* who remains here as the agent of *person_mentioned*Haden Edwardsthe Empresario*/person_mentioned* and disclosing many secrets on Slavery among them the said *person_mentioned*Edwards */person_mentioned*went immediately to the *location_mentioned*Irish Bayou*/location_mentioned* and set in on the *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*Him and *person_mentioned*John A Williams */person_mentioned*and*person_mentioned* Burrill Thompson*/person_mentioned* and has eventually succeeded to effect a confusion among them as no dependence can be placed among them and the said *person_mentioned*B. Edwards*/person_mentioned* has this morning sent *person_mentioned*Chaplin */person_mentioned*among them with a large Packet against the *person_mentioned*authority */person_mentioned*of this place what this may end in God only knows the *location_mentioned*House of *person_mentioned*Dill */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Dust [Durst]*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* has worked on the mind of their *person_mentioned*Friends */person_mentioned*as they keep a *location_mentioned*Boarding House*/location_mentioned* for the *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*It has touched the minds of some of the*person_mentioned* old Citizens */person_mentioned*in a word much confusion remains here and all has originated from the *person_mentioned*Empresario*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I received a Letter this morning from*location_mentioned* Austin's Colony */location_mentioned*this day and am informed that they are worse there than here and I presume the confusion came first from them or the cause.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*has requested the *person_mentioned*Alcalda */person_mentioned*of this place to check me as He said I was in the habit of informing the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*continually the dangers of a rebellion All I have to say on this subject is Had he fought for the Freedom of this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*and spent all he had He would be a man particular in defending it But Your Excellency will see no *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*can comply with their obligation to this Government agreeable to Laws and eventually if the calculations fail all interest for the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*will fail and the result will be confusion which I do not consider is at hand I dont say that a rebellion is in hand Judge yourself what I do say from your own opinion I want your *person_mentioned*Excellency */person_mentioned*to send *person_mentioned*Troops */person_mentioned*to enforce the Laws and every where establish order every where I am ready to aid you at all times I shall use evry exertion in my power untill the return mail and if times cant be altered I must leave my *person_mentioned*Family */person_mentioned*and then Contend Myself in person for the Laws and Authority untill I Die*/p*
*p*God and Liberty*/p*
*p*I remain your Excellencies most obt very Humble Servant*/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned* James Gaines*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Satillo */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-7-1826">Oct. the 7. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I send you a Copy of a Letter wrote by *person_mentioned*Mr. James Gaines*/person_mentioned* to this *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*stating what you will see in said letter You have that *person_mentioned*poisinous serpent*/person_mentioned* who underhanded is writing against you all you ought to take care of Him for if He dont injure you it is not for the want of trying you will see by His letter that I drew off word for word.*/p*
*p*I wish you to let all the *location_mentioned*Ayish Bayou*/location_mentioned* know it and see what He and his *person_mentioned*Brother in Law*/person_mentioned* wishes to do if it was in their power *person_mentioned*Norris */person_mentioned*has written to the same effect this is wrote by a *person_mentioned*Friend */person_mentioned*who dont sign his name for good reasons but you will know who he is in a short time.*/p*
*p*Ponga mi Rubrica no mas */p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Mr. Joseph Dust [Durst]*/person_mentioned* */p*
*p*A true copy taken from the original in the *location_mentioned*secretary's office */location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-06-1826">Oct. 6th 182*/date_mentioned**/p*6
*p**person_mentioned*Jas E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*P. S. In some places I have corrected the spelling and in others have left it as it is in the original, which is so badly written that it was with much difficulty the meaning could be ascertained.—[Austin]*/p*
*/div1*
